intro.name: Hey, I'm Caleb
intro.description: Welcome to my portfolio. I'm a web developer with a passion for creating amazing user experiences.
intro.description2: And here, I share what I've been working on recently and things I learned along the way.
intro.description3: Besides software, another of my passions are mathematics and reading. I love teaching and learning new things every day.

project1.title: Project 1
project1.description: Here are some of the projects I've worked on.

project2.title: Project 2
project2.description: This is a description of project 2.

job1.title: Fullstack Developer
job1.description: I work as a fullstack developer on various projects. I'm responsible for developing and maintaining web applications, creating APIs, and implementing new features.

job2.title: Mobile Device Managament
job2.description: I worked as a Mobile Device Management Specialist at Indra Sistemas. I was responsible for managing mobile devices, creating and deploying applications, and providing technical support to end users.

job3.title: Apple Certified Technician
job3.description: I worked as an Apple Certified iOS and macOS Technician. I was responsible for providing technical support to end users, troubleshooting hardware and software issues, and repairing Apple devices.

job4.title: Private Math Tutor
job4.description: I work as a private math tutor, helping students improve their math skills and prepare for exams. I create personalized lesson plans based on each student's needs and provide ongoing support and feedback.

about.title: About me
about.description: I'm a web developer based in Madrid, Spain. Focused on creating amazing user experiences using different technologies. Besides software, I love maths, reading and traveling (New York is my favorite city). I'm always looking for new opportunities to learn and grow in all areas of my life.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.description: Please contact me if you have any questions or would like to work together.
